parts.str: Please enter your age in years
Age must be a number between 0 and 120
What is your residential postal code?
A valid postal code is composed of four digits number
In which province do you live in?
What is your highest education level?
Are you employed or earning income from self-employment?
Are you a health care worker?
Please indicate on average, how many people do you come in contact with per week day at your workplace or school
Please indicate on average how many hours do you spend on public transport in the morning
Slide the blue circle to the appropriate time frame. Extreme left is 0 hours and extreme right is 6 hours
Please indicate on average how many hours do you spend on public transport in the afternoon
Slide the blue circle to the appropriate time frame. Extreme left is 0 hours and extreme right is 6 hours
How many people live in your household?
How many rooms are used for sleeping?
Do you smoke any tobacco products?
Do you have any of the following comorbidities (underlying medical illness)?
In what sector do you usually obtain healthcare?
